inclusion.criterion: satisfactory colposcopy identifying the junction and the lesion
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: affiliated person or beneficiary of a social security scheme
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: having given their oral agreement and authorization to the processing of their data
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: atypical or atypical glandular cells or cancer incidentally discovered during smear
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: A 54-year-old woman with abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion, HPV 16 positive. She smokes and drinks alcohol frequently.
